MakerMela 2020
Blog
Published Jan 12, 2020
This was a maker gathering event held in Mumbai @ Somaiya VidhyaVihar from 9th to 11th January 2020.
Lots of makers from India came and it was probably the largest maker gathering in Asia. Keynote speakers like Mitch Altman fromÂ HacksterSpaces.comÂ and Ashish Hemranjani, Founder of BookMyShow gave great inspirational speeches.
The event was covered by many media sources:
ABP Majha coverage video of Maker Mela
TOI
The Hindu covered Maker Mela
Out of the several young makers that were presenting various projects. I was selected as the Best Young Innovator for my project: Smart Agriculture and received a trophy for same. Lots of interesting ideas and suggestions came up which I would love to incorporate in my Project.
